description: For declaring properties in RML it is used the predicate rr:predicateObjectMap as shown in the mapping below. Notice that for the object property the rr:predicate must specify the predicate that will appear in the output triplets and, similarly how the subject is specifyed, the object property is declared using rr:template and a string contaning static information and may have data coming from the data source (the CSV in this case), for instance "https://dbpedia.org/page/{City}". Fill the mapping below with the object property rdfs:seeAlso "https://dbpedia.org/page/{City}"
